name: Arugula-Fig Salad with Creamy Gorgonzola
author: Anastasia
summary: This easy, low-carb fig salad with creamy Gorgonzola and peppery arugula is a beautiful and elegant dish that's perfect for a light lunch or a summer salad. Makes for easy summer entertaining if you prep everything in advance and assemble just before serving. I didn't feel the need to toss this salad as I was afraid of damaging the gorgeous figs.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon orange blossom water, or more to taste
3 ounces creamy Gorgonzola cheese, diced into small cubes
sea salt and cracked black pepper to taste
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, orange blossom water, orange juice, and orange zest in a glass jar and shake dressing until emulsified
Arrange arugula on a salad platter, place figs on top, then top with Gorgonzola cheese and scatter the crushed pistachios over to garnish
Pour the dressing over the salad and serve immediately
